name: Clementine's Candy Curse
description:
A top-down score-based Trick or Treat game where every piece of candy leads to another undead zombie chasing you around!

WASD to move

"Enter" Key in front of doors to get candy

This is my first 3D project and I made it throughout the month of October 2019 with some help from my 4(almost 5)-year-old daughter.  It still needs quite a bit of work and polish but I'm pretty happy with where I got by Halloween Day.
